data.price: 80. Dis : « Seigneur ! Veuille me faire entrer d’une entrée heureuse et me faire sortir d’une sortie (tout aussi) heureuse. Fais que me soient accordés, de Ta part, pouvoir et soutien.
data.arabic: وَقُل رَّبِّ أَدۡخِلۡنِي مُدۡخَلَ صِدۡقٖ وَأَخۡرِجۡنِي مُخۡرَجَ صِدۡقٖ وَٱجۡعَل لِّي مِن لَّدُنكَ سُلۡطَٰنٗا نَّصِيرٗا

meta.transliteration: waqul rabbi adkhil'nī mud'khala ṣid'qin wa-akhrij'nī mukh'raja ṣid'qin wa-ij'ʿal lī min ladunka sul'ṭānan naṣīran

dua.name: Dua for Sustenance
dua.significanceReason: Seeks divine assistance in livelihood, career, and economic prosperity. Frequently recited by those seeking professional and financial breakthroughs.

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.
